Article Title: Michael Strahan’s daughter Isabella calls out sister’s 'unsupportive' behavior during challenging cancer recovery journey
Article Text:
Credit: Instagram/isabellastrahan

Michael Strahan’s daughter opens up about feeling unsupported by her sister during cancer recovery journey



Isabella Strahan, daughter of NFL legend Michael Strahan, is proving to be a true warrior after overcoming a grueling nine-month battle with brain cancer. Now, as she approaches her one-year cancer-free milestone, Isabella is embracing life with renewed strength alongside her twin sister, Sophia. Her inspiring journey reflects resilience, sisterly bonds, and the power of a positive mindset.On a recent episode of the Battlefront podcast, Isabella shared an amusing yet surprising revelation about Sophia’s support—or lack thereof—during her recovery. “Kinda just vlogging reflecting back. I would always love to follow it on the TV at home. I don’t think that Sophia has seen any of my vlogs, so yeah, she is like the number one ‘unsupporter’ over here. It’s be like, ‘How could you not have seen a single one’?” Isabella joked. While it’s hard to imagine fighting cancer without full support from a twin, it’s clear that their relationship is built on playful honesty and deep love.After receiving her diagnosis in October 2023, Isabella decided to open up about her health journey through a YouTube vlog channel. Her candid updates not only helped her process the challenges of cancer treatment but also inspired countless followers. Though Sophia may not have watched the vlogs, her real-life support has been unwavering. The twins’ bond is more evident than ever as they face life’s ups and downs together.On March 12th, Isabella took to her Instagram story to share a heartwarming moment with Sophia during a much-needed “sister session.” The Strahan sisters were seen crushing a kettlebell deadlift workout while sporting stylish Alo Yoga gear. Isabella looked fierce in her black gym wear, while Sophia kept it cool in a gray outfit. What stood out most, however, was Isabella’s radiant smile and the sight of her curls growing back beautifully—a visible sign of her recovery. It’s inspiring to see her reclaim her strength after such a tough battle.Fitness has become a central part of Isabella’s post-recovery routine, with Sophia right by her side. Their shared workouts are more than just a way to stay fit—they symbolize the strength and support that have defined Isabella’s comeback. With Sophia as her rock, Isabella is stepping into this new chapter of life with confidence and grace. Her journey from battling cancer to thriving alongside her sister is a powerful testament to resilience, love, and the unbreakable bond between siblings.Also Read: NFL teams make history with unprecedented move ahead of 2025 Draft after 55 years Meanwhile, Sophia Strahan recently shared with PEOPLE magazine how she became a pillar of strength for her twin sister, Isabella, during her battle with brain cancer. Sophia’s goal was to help Isabella feel like a typical young adult, even while undergoing intense treatment.Reflecting on their conversations, Sophia recalled, "Something she would say to me quite a few times was like, 'I just don't feel normal. I want to feel normal. Nothing about my life right now is normal.'" Sophia explained, "I think something that I tried to do best was to make her feel normal." Her unwavering support and efforts to create a sense of normalcy highlight the powerful bond between the Strahan sisters during Isabella’s challenging journey.
Article Summary: Michael strahan's daughter, isabella, is one year cancer-free. Isabella opened up about her recovery on her youtube vlog channel. Her twin sister, sophia, has been a pillar of strength for isabella during her recovery. The sisters recently shared a photo of a workout together.

Article Title: 'We have informed the BCCI': KKR vs LSG IPL 2025 match at Eden Gardens likely to be rescheduled due to security concerns
Article Text:
KKR cricketers during a training session at Eden Gardens. (PTI Photo)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

IPL: How will GT, LSG, DC, PBKS, RR fare? Greenstone Lobo predicts

NEW DELHI: Kolkata Knight Riders ' home match against Lucknow Super Giants, scheduled for April 6 at Eden Gardens , faces the likelihood of rescheduling as local police have declined security clearance due to Ram Navami festivities. The situation stems from BJP leader Suvendu Adhikari 's announcement of over 20,000 processions across West Bengal during the festival, prompting heightened security measures statewide.Cricket Association of Bengal (CAB) president Snehasish Ganguly confirmed after two discussions with the police on Tuesday that the authorities "have not given the go-ahead" for the match. He explained that they categorically stated they would not be able to provide adequate security, making it unfeasible to accommodate a crowd of 65,000 without police protection.The CAB has since informed the Board of Control for Cricket in India ( BCCI ) about the situation, with some time still available to make a final decision. Ganguly also pointed out that a similar scenario occurred last year when a scheduled IPL match on Ram Navami had to be rescheduled."They have categorically said they won't be able to provide adequate security. If there's no police protection, accommodating a 65,000-strong crowd becomes impossible," Snehasish was quoted as saying by PTI. "We have informed the BCCI, and there is still time to take a final call. Even last year, a scheduled IPL match on Ram Navami had to be rescheduled."The anticipated clash between Kolkata Knight Riders and Lucknow Super Giants was expected to draw significant attendance, given the strong local following of both teams. With LSG owned by RPSG Group chairman Sanjiv Goenka, the match held considerable appeal for cricket enthusiasts in the region.Meanwhile, the 2025 IPL season is set to kick off at Eden Gardens on March 22, featuring defending champions KKR against Royal Challengers Bengaluru. The grand opening ceremony, which will last approximately 35 minutes, is expected to showcase performances by singer Shreya Ghoshal and actress Disha Patani. ICC chairman Jay Shah and other prominent dignitaries are expected to attend the event, marking the return of a grand opening ceremony at Eden Gardens after a long gap.Snehasish Ganguly expressed enthusiasm about the marquee match, noting that the demand for tickets has been overwhelming. He refrained from sharing more details about the opening ceremony but emphasised that preparations are in full swing to make it a memorable event.
Article Summary: Kolkata knight riders'home match against lucknow super giants, scheduled for april 6 at eden gardens, faces the likelihood of rescheduling. Local police have declined security clearance due to ram navami festivities. The situation stems from bjp leader suvendu adhikari's announcement of over 20,000 processions across west bengal during the festival.

Article Title: Is MLB The Show 25 available on Xbox Game Pass?
Article Text:
(Image Via - MLBTheShow’s “X” Account)

Will MLB The Show 25 be available on Xbox Game Pass?



What does this move mean for the Xbox Players?



The fans of MLB The Show were quite thrilled when the series made its debut in 2021 on Xbox Game Pass. It allowed the subscribers to play the game without any additional cost. The trend then continued with MLB The Show 22, 23, and 24. But now, as the series is closer to its latest release, the highly anticipated game fans, especially the Xbox Game Pass subscribers, are quite eager to play the game and wish to know how they can access MLB The Show 25 .While there has been no official explanation from MLB or Sony since 2021, it’s the first time that MLB The Show 25 won’t be available on Xbox Game Pass. So, the fans cannot play it, either at launch or during 2025. Breaking the series' 4-year tradition, the news has been confirmed by MLB and Sony that the game will skip the subscription services this year entirely. It will require the players to purchase the game outright. The official statement from MLB The Show 25 developers read, “The game will not be on platform subscription services in 2025."The shift here likely reflects the evolving licensing strategies. The move has left the fans disappointed, especially those who got accustomed to the game access through the Game Pass Subscription. The previous titles, including MLB The Show 24, will be removed from the Game Pass by late March 2025 too. It signals the clear departure of the series from its early partnership with the Xbox subscription service.For the Xbox users, it means the gamers will have to pay $69.99 full price for the Standard Edition. They can even opt for Digital Deluxe Edition for $79.99. It comes with early access, starting March 14, 2025. The Collector’s Edition is priced at $229.99. It will offer the players additional physical goodies like a steelbook case and exclusive items. But it's a steep investment for most players.MLB The Show 25 absence on Game Pass raises questions about the game’s accessibility, especially for casual players who might not wish to spend $70 on a single game. However, the multi-platform availability of the game ensures that players on PlayStation, Xbox, and Nintendo Switch can still enjoy the latest installment, albeit at the full price.
Article Summary: Mlb the show 25 won’t be available on xbox game pass. The game will require the players to purchase the game outright. The move has left the fans disappointed, especially those who got accustomed to the game access through the game pass subscription. It signals the clear departure of the series from its early partnership with the xbox subscription service.

Article Title: “He’s tired”: Golden State Warriors coach Steve Kerr is looking for ways to rest Stephen Curry for a while amid a loss to the Denver Nuggets
Article Text:
(Image Credit: Stephen Curry/Instagram)

Stephen Curry needs rest to bounce back for upcoming matches Stephen Curry recently celebrated his 37th birthday after reaching 25,000 points in his successful NBA career. The Golden State Warriors point guard is now fatigued and needs rest to recover from the strain he's been feeling on the court during back-to-back games. Coach Steve Kerr is aware of this and wants to give him a short break to regain the energy he's known for, in order to bounce back for the playoffs.Speaking about Curry’s recent struggles, Kerr told the Associated Press, “He’s tired. Steph’s been carrying us for a month, he’s been amazing. He’s tired, so we’ve got to get him some rest. You can see it, he just doesn’t have his energy right now.”He added, “He’s exhausted right now. We’ve got to absolutely consider giving him a night and getting him rejuvenated for the sake of him and the remainder of our games. We’ll see. But I think he’s been tired the last few games so we’ve got to find a way to get him his juice back.” AP reports that the coach will speak with Director of Sports Medicine and Performance Rick Celebrini about the same.Golden State Warriors guard Gary Payton II mentioned that the team will pitch in to give Curry the rest he deserves. “We try to take the pressure off him as much as we can. He has a guy on his hip 48 minutes of the game. I’m pretty sure he’s a little gassed,” he said.Curry definitely has reasons to feel worn out. Just days before his subpar performance against the Denver Nuggets, he made history by becoming the first NBA player to hit 4,000 three-pointers in his remarkable 16-year career. However, in the game that followed, he struggled, making just 6 of 21 shot attempts. His turnovers were particularly costly, allowing the Nuggets to score 24 points off his mistakes. Despite his efforts, the Warriors fell short and lost the game.Also Read: NBA Offseason Rumors: Golden State Warriors might sign $48 million Milwaukee Bucks star to support Stephen Curry and Jimmy Butler On his birthday, Curry shared a glimpse of his busy life and milestones. “4K!!! New milestones added. A very nice bday present. Thankful for all the messages and love today and always! 37. A reminder to Never Limit God!” he wrote.
Article Summary: Stephen curry recently celebrated his 37th birthday after reaching 25,000 points in his successful nba career. The golden state warriors point guard is now fatigued and needs rest to recover from the strain he's been feeling during back-to-back games. Coach steve kerr is aware of this and wants to give him a short break to regain the energy he's known for.

Article Title: Best 2025 NFL Free-Agent Signings: Top deals that could reshape Season
Article Text:
Davante Adams (via: Getty Images)

Free-Agent Signings to change 2025 NFL landscape



Grading the Big 2025 NFL Free Agent Signings So Far

5. Mekhi Becton, OG, Los Angeles Chargers – A powerhouse in the trenches



4. Drew Dalman, C, Chicago Bears – The protector Caleb Williams needed



3. Jevon Holland, S, New York Giants – The defensive chess piece



2. Josh Sweat, Edge, Arizona Cardinals – A high-stakes gamble that could pay off



1. Davante Adams, WR, Los Angeles Rams – The superstar signing that can change everything

Final Take: How these bold moves will shape 2025 NFL Season



The 2025 NFL free agency period wasn’t packed with blockbuster deals, as many teams prioritized retaining their stars. The Bengals locked in Ja’Marr Chase and Tee Higgins, while the Chiefs secured Trey Smith with a hefty franchise tag. However, a few game-changing moves still shook up the league. Here are the top five signings that could reshape the NFL landscape this season.Mekhi Becton’s road to NFL redemption has been a rollercoaster. Once plagued by injuries and inconsistency with the New York Jets, the 25-year-old offensive lineman proved his worth with the Philadelphia Eagles, helping pave the way to a Super Bowl victory. Yet, concerns about his durability kept his price tag reasonable.That’s where the Chargers swooped in, signing him to a two-year, $20 million deal—an absolute steal compared to other offensive linemen this offseason. With rookie phenom Joe Alt at right tackle, Becton will have the perfect setup to thrive, bulldozing defenders for Najee Harris and giving Justin Herbert the protection he desperately needs.Caleb Williams took a brutal 68 sacks in his rookie season, making offensive line reinforcements the Bears’ top priority. Enter Drew Dalman, the former Atlanta Falcons center who has been a model of consistency. His run-blocking skills and ability to hold the pocket make him a critical addition to Chicago’s revamped offensive line.Signing Dalman to a three-year, $42 million deal gives the Bears an anchor in the middle, pairing him with newly acquired guards Jonah Jackson and Joe Thuney. If Chicago wants to take the next step offensively, Dalman’s presence will be key.While the Giants remain in quarterback limbo, they didn’t hesitate to bolster their defense. Jevon Holland, formerly of the Miami Dolphins, has emerged as one of the league’s most versatile safeties. His ability to play multiple positions in the secondary makes him a game-changer for New York.On a three-year, $45 million deal, Holland joins a defense that already features stars like Dexter Lawrence II, Brian Burns, and Kayvon Thibodeaux. After losing Xavier McKinney last season, the Giants made sure they weren’t making the same mistake twice. With Holland’s playmaking skills, this defense could become one of the NFL’s elite units.Finding a dominant edge rusher in this free-agent class was a challenge, but the Cardinals weren’t willing to settle. They went all-in on Josh Sweat, signing him to a four-year, $76.4 million deal. While some critics question the investment in a player with just one double-digit sack season, Arizona coach Jonathan Gannon knows exactly what Sweat brings to the table.The two worked together in Philadelphia, where Sweat thrived under Gannon’s defensive schemes. Now, the Cardinals are banking on him to be the centerpiece of their pass rush alongside Dalvin Tomlinson and first-round pick Darius Robinson. If Sweat can replicate his 2022 form, this deal could be a game-changer for Arizona’s defense.The Rams have never been afraid to make bold moves, and signing Davante Adams is another statement that they’re going all-in. The 32-year-old wideout inked a two-year, $46 million contract, proving that Los Angeles sees themselves as legitimate contenders once again.Despite his age, Adams showed last season that he’s still one of the NFL’s elite receivers, posting 85 catches for 1,063 yards and eight touchdowns. His arrival not only gives Matthew Stafford a top-tier perimeter threat but also takes pressure off breakout star Puka Nacua. Defenses can no longer key in on Nacua, making the Rams’ passing attack even more dangerous.Also Read: After jumping to rival Steelers, Juan Thornhill breaks silence on Browns While some teams played it safe, these five franchises made bold free-agent moves that could redefine their seasons. Whether it’s Adams elevating the Rams’ offense, Becton solidifying the Chargers’ trenches, or Holland bolstering the Giants’ secondary, these signings have the potential to shape the 2025 NFL landscape. Keep an eye on these impact players as they look to justify their contracts and lead their teams to success.
Article Summary: The 2025 nfl free agency period wasn’t packed with blockbuster deals. However, a few game-changing moves still shook up the league. Davante adams, drew dalman, jevon holland and josh sweat are the top five signings. The rams signed wideout josh adams to a two-year, $46 million contract.

Article Title: ‘I Don’t Need You Anymore’: John Cena Shares Emotional Note After WWE Universe Break-Up
Article Text:
(Image Via X)

What did John Cena say at WWE RAW?

John Cena shares emotional note on his WWE Universe split

Friends

Also Read

The WWE Monday Night RAW edition of March 17, 2025, featured some of the top-tier talents and interesting storyline development ahead for the subsequent events of the company. One such event was John Cena ’s return to the ring after the Elimination Chamber PLE feud against Cody Rhodes.The recent episode of RAW emanated live from Brussels, Belgium, where John Cena appeared after his heel turn. The fans booed and criticized him because of his premium live-event action.The Cenation leader has dumped the WWE Universe and his fans for their abusive behavior over the years on the latest Monday Night RAW. Following Cena’s announcement, Cody Rhodes faced John Cena for the first time after their Elimination Chamber PLE. The American Nightmare suggested Cena find his true self in their upcoming WrestleMania match.John Cena entered the ring with an angry face and a usual entry, unlike he did previously. He did not run to the ring, not acknowledge anyone, and not even toss his fan flag like he did. The Cenation leader entered the ring and expressed his angst against his fans, who have been thoroughly unsupportive throughout his 25 years of journey.John Cena after entering the ring said in an angry tone: "Well, listen to this. I am breaking up with you. I am done. I am breaking up with every single person. Whether you like me or don't, you're dumped. I don't need you anymore. I don't care about you and you don't matter to me. And here's a thing, there's no noise you can make, there's nothing you can do because you know I am right and you know you are wrong."He also added that he has been in an abusive relationship over the past 25 years for which the WWE champion has announced his breakup with fans and the WWE Universe. He also further added: "I am not a babyface, I am not a heel, I am a human being and each and every one of you have been awful to me."The Cenation leader has also claimed that his fans have spoiled his farewell tour and in return treated him like a puppet. Cena thought that he would do something good for the last time for the company and WWE, but his plans were completely ruined.Following the dramatic event, Cody Rhodes entered the ring and humiliated John Cena for his Elimination Chamber action and asked him to find the real John Cena for their ultimate WrestleMania 41 battle.After the Cenation leader announced his split with the WWE universe and fans, the WWE Champion took to his Instagram handle to share a cryptic post on the same decision. The wrestler has shared this emotional note right after the announcement and venting out his frustration at the RAW event.John Cena shared a meme on his social media handle from the American sitcom, where the characters Ross and Rachel are on a break-up from their relationship.The meme signified Cena’s situation with his split from his fans, confirming that he has indeed broken up with his fans. As the Cenation leader and the American Nightmare head towards the WrestleMania match, it will be interesting to witness what more drama is still there to unfold.
Article Summary: The cenation leader has dumped the wwe universe and his fans for their abusive behavior over the years. John cena entered the ring with an angry face and a usual entry, unlike he did previously. The american nightmare suggested cena find his true self in their upcoming wrestlemania match.

Article Title: “What's going on with the disrespect?”: Connor Bedard’s NHL treatment sparks debate among analysts
Article Text:
Image via Getty Images

Controversy grows over Connor Bedard’s misconduct calls

Chicago Blackhawks analysts are frustrated with the way Connor Bedard is being treated in the NHL. Their concerns grew after he received back-to-back 10-minute misconduct penalties in recent games, which they found unusual for his normally composed play. Analysts from The Chicago Lead questioned the officiating, feeling that Bedard is not getting the respect he deserves.Connor Bedard’s recent penalties have sparked debate over whether the issue lies with him or NHL officiating. Analysts pointed to past incidents, questioning the league’s treatment of the young star.After Connor Bedard's consecutive misconduct penalties, analysts from The Chicago Lead raised an important question, “Is this more so a Bedard issue or an official issue? Because I’m trying to make it make sense,” said one among the trio of CHSN analysts. However, none of them had the answer. “I don't know what is going on with the disrespect in the NHL for Conor Bedard,” responded the co-host.This wasn’t the first time Bedard faced such treatment. Analysts pointed out a previous incident when Colorado Avalanche’s Ryan Lindgren cross-checked him during a game in Colorado. “I’d be frustrated too. He’s 19 years old. He’s barely raised his voice in two years in Chicago,” added the analyst.Connor Bedard couldn’t remember exactly what he said, but he acknowledged the need to be more careful. He admitted, “I gotta be smarter with my words there. I’m supposed to deal in the situation,” during a locker room interview. NHL insider Frank Seravalli had also shared a similar opinion. “He needs to be smarter, and he needs to keep his emotions in check better,” said the analyst.Blackhawks interim coach Anders Sorensen sees Bedard’s struggles as temporary, despite his up-and-down season.The Swedish coach pointed out that even NHL legends faced challenges early in their careers. He mentioned, “I remember Sidney Crosby went through that a lot. I remember Peter Forsberg came into the league mild-mannered off the ice, but on the ice, it happens, right?” to emphasize that Bedard’s struggles are not unusual.Also Read: Wayne Gretzky is suing his ex-business partner over weight loss gum claims Despite the criticism and challenges, Connor Bedard continues to prove his talent and resilience. With support from his coaches and the experience of NHL greats to learn from, his struggles seem to be just a stepping stone in his promising career.
Article Summary: Chicago blackhawks analysts are frustrated with the way connor bedard is being treated in the nhl. Their concerns grew after he received back-to-back 10-minute misconduct penalties in recent games. Analysts pointed to past incidents, questioning the league’s treatment of the young star.

Article Title: Will Jayson Tatum play tonight against the Brooklyn Nets? Latest update on the Boston Celtics star's injury report (March 18, 2025)
Article Text:
Is Jayson Tatum playing tonight? (Image via Getty) Is Jayson Tatum playing tonight? Boston Celtics injury report for tonight’s game against the Brooklyn Nets (March 18, 2025)

Celtics injury report March 18 (Image via NBA)

Brooklyn Nets injury report for tonight’s game against the Boston Celtics (March 18, 2025) When and where to watch the Boston Celtics play tonight against the Brooklyn Nets (March 18, 2025)? The Boston Celtics are gearing up for a crucial matchup against the Brooklyn Nets on Tuesday, March 18, at TD Garden, but all eyes are on star forward Jayson Tatum’s injury status. Tatum is listed as questionable due to a knee issue, casting uncertainty over his availability for the game. Jayson Tatum , who leads the Celtics with 27.1 points per game (fifth in the NBA), has been a cornerstone of Boston’s success this season. His potential absence could significantly impact the team’s performance, especially with Jaylen Brown already ruled out due to a back injury. Over the last 20 games, Tatum has averaged 25.5 points, 7.4 rebounds, and 6.3 assists, showcasing his all-around dominance.The Celtics, currently sitting at 49-19, have been one of the league’s top teams, outscoring opponents by 8.4 points per game. Their offense ranks seventh in the NBA, averaging 116.6 points, while their defense is third, allowing just 108.2 points. Tatum’s contributions extend beyond scoring; he leads the team in rebounds (8.7 per game) and three-pointers made (3.6 per game), both critical to Boston’s success.If Jayson Tatum is unable to play, the Celtics will rely heavily on Derrick White and Payton Pritchard to step up. White has been solid, averaging 17.2 points and 4.8 assists over the last 20 games, while Pritchard has provided a spark with 13.7 points and 3.3 three-pointers per game during the same stretch.On the other side, the Nets (23-45) are dealing with their own injury woes. Cameron Thomas and De’Anthony Melton are out for the season, while Noah Clowney and Ziaire Williams are probable. Brooklyn has struggled offensively, ranking 29th in the league with 105.6 points per game, and will face an uphill battle against Boston’s stout defense.The game tips off at 7:30 p.m. ET and will be broadcast on NBA TV, NBCS-BOS, and YES. Fans can also stream the action on Fubo, though regional restrictions may apply.As the Celtics aim to maintain their momentum in the playoff race, Jayson Tatum’s status remains the biggest storyline. His presence on the court could be the difference-maker in what promises to be a competitive showdown.
Article Summary: The boston celtics face the brooklyn nets on tuesday, march 18, at td garden. Jayson tatum is listed as questionable due to a knee issue, casting uncertainty over his availability for the game. The celtics, currently sitting at 49-19, have been one of the league’s top teams.

Article Title: "Papi needs love": Fans thrilled as Red Sox icon David Ortiz announces engagement with long-term girlfriend Maria Yeribel
Article Text:
Fans thrilled as Red Sox icon David Ortiz announces engagement with long-term girlfriend Maria Yeribel (Image Source: Getty)

It’s Official! David Ortiz pops the question to his longtime love Maria Yeribel

David Ortiz gets down on one knee for Maria Yeribel - Fans overjoyed the proposal

Love is in the air as the MLB legend of Boston Red Sox, David Ortiz proposes to his long time girlfriend Maria Yeribel on her birthday in an intimate dinner. The engagement video posted by David Ortiz on Instagram is making his fans go crazy as finally the couple got engaged on a date night.On Tuesday, David Ortiz, the all-rounder MLB player of the Boston Red Sox took over the internet by posting the proposal video of him proposing to his long-time girlfriend. The couple were spotted having an intimate dinner on the occasion of Maria Yeribel’s birthday at a restaurant, where David Ortiz proposed to her.As posted on the social media platform, David Ortiz can be seen proposing to his girlfriend with a ring. David Ortiz and Maria Yeribel have been in a serious relationship since 2019. However, they were private about their relationship as the divorce of David Ortiz was not finalised until the year 2023, when David Ortiz was divorced and announced his relationship publicly. The couple were also blessed with a healthy baby boy last year and shared some unseen pictures with their child.The set-up of the proposal was quite dreamy and like a perfect gentleman, David Ortiz went down on one knee to propose to his girlfriend, Maria Yeribel. David Ortiz who is one of the most significant players of the Boston Red Sox is now heading towards a new journey in his personal life after the dissolution of his long-term marriage with his ex-wife Tiffany Ortiz.David Ortiz and his girlfriend Maria Yeribel have been in a serious relationship for a long time and it was finally the time they took the next step in their relationship. Although David Ortiz has been doing well in his game, it was time for him to embark on some new changes in his personal life as well. It’s a sign that David Ortiz has happily moved on from his 25 years long marriage and is now in capability of making some significant decisions in his life.Also Read: Albert Pujols set to return to the WBC as the Dominican Republic's manager in 2026
Article Summary: Fans thrilled as red sox icon david ortiz announces engagement with long-term girlfriend maria yeribel. The engagement video posted by david ortiz on instagram is making his fans go crazy as finally the couple got engaged on a date night. David ortiz who is one of the most significant players of the boston red sox is now heading towards a new journey in his personal life.

Article Title: WWE Stars Slam Rhea Ripley Amid WrestleMania 41 Contract Signing Row
Article Text:
(Image Via Getty Images)

WWE Stars slam Rhea Ripley for her WWE RAW action

Will WrestleMania feature a triple-threat match?

Also Read

The March 17, 2025, edition of WWE RAW witnessed some interesting segments that could change the trajectory of the storyline of WrestleMania 41. WWE Monday RAW, which emanated live from Brussels, Belgium, also saw some shocking results in the contract signing segment between IYO SKY and Bianca Belair .Previously, Bianca Belair won the Women’s Elimination Chamber match during the premium live event in Toronto, Canada, while IYO SKY won against Rhea Ripley on the March 4 edition of WWE Monday Night RAW.However, Bianca Belair and IYO SKY were scheduled to sign a contract for the showdown of the Women’s World Championship match at WrestleMania 41. The contract signing segment was intervened by Rhea Ripley, which now led to become a much-talked about event in the company.During the segment, IYO Sky and Bianca Belair appeared inside the ring for the contract signing of their WrestleMania 41. As they exchanged words accompanied by Raw General Manager Adam Pearce, Rhea Ripley intervened between them and claimed that it was her match to be in and that she was duped by them in the previous WWE RAW match.The heated exchange led Rhea to take down Bianca with a headbutt and then kicked Sky and Ripley gave SKY a powerbomb onto Belair on the table. Following the attack, Ripley signed the contract to appear in the Women’s World Championship title in WrestleMania 41.This action did not go well with several WWE stars and they have demanded a similar treatment from the company and about signing contracts for championships. As per reports, WWE stars like Zoey Stark, and Shayna Baszler have criticized Mami for her WWE RAW action.Zoey Stark took to her X account and took a dig at Rhea Ripley. In her statement, she added that she too wanted to be added to the Women's World Championship match at WrestleMania and wanted to sign contracts. Stark on her X handle wrote: “If we can just add names, can someone pass the contract over here.”Meanwhile, Shayna Baszler has also in her statement on X criticized the act, demanding a similar opportunity to sign a contract. The WWE star said, “So, that’s a thing? We can just sign our name on whatever contract?”Previously, IYO SKY’s controversial win at the WWE RAW had left Ripley completely distraught. Owing to the situation Rhea Ripley has tried to claim multiple times that she deserves a shot at the title because Belair’s involvement cost Ripley the match.However, it has been reported that IYO SKY along with Bianca Belair and Ripley are going together at the Show of Shows, following the signing of the contract. As per Fightful Select, the plan has been set for a Rhea Ripley, Bianca Belair, and IYO SKY triple threat at the upcoming WrestleMania.
Article Summary: The march 17, 2025, edition of wwe raw witnessed some interesting segments that could change the trajectory of the storyline of wrestlemania 41. Wwe stars like zoey stark, and shayna baszler have criticized mami for her wwe raw action.

Article Title: "He keeps getting better": Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce’s old photo from a date night resurfaces and fans can’t get enough
Article Text:
Image via Getty Images

Taylor Swift And Travis Kelce’s Picture From An Old Date Night Resurfaces And Sends Fans Into A Frenzy



Taylor Swift And Travis Kelce Are Back In The Public Eye After Taking A Break For A Few Days From The Media



Taylor Swift, the billionaire pop star, is now frequently being spotted on dates with her NFL star boyfriend, Travis Kelce. While fans are excited to see the two after a long time, some are disappointed because the couple is maintaining privacy and trying to avoid cameras as much as they can. As a result, Taylor Swift’s face has not been seen since the Super Bowl even though she has been spotted outside. Recently, an old picture of the two resurfaced on X and fans are losing their minds over it.While this picture remains undated, it looks like a picture from Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce’s date night before the Super Bowl in New Orleans when they were out with Patrick Mahomes and his wife, Brittany Mahomes.In the picture that has now gone viral again, Taylor Swift looks stunning in a black dress while Travis Kelce is seen wearing a grey coloured jacket.A fan account of Taylor Swift shared the picture on X and fans are losing their minds over it. A fan wrote, “Istg Travis just gets better and better ever since he's dating with Taylor”, while another fan wrote, “The likes? Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce will always be THE couple”.A third fan wrote, “You knew what you wanted and boy, you got her”, while another user wrote, “Looking like a couple in a Hallmark movie romcom. Love to see them so happy together. ❤️”Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce have always been pretty frequent with their dinner dates and have always been spotted outside walking hand in hand. However, things changed after the drama that happened at the Super Bowl 2025.With Travis Kelce’s team, the Kansas City Chiefs, losing the match and Taylor Swift getting booed, the two decided to maintain complete privacy about their relationship and disappeared from the public eye.This disappearance of theirs had gotten many fans worried as fans were stressed about the couple’s future and about their mental health. But now it seems like everything is fine with Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce even though it is not known what prompted them to be back in the public eye again.Currently, there are many speculations around Travis Kelce’s future in the NFL and if he will choose to retire in this upcoming season of the NFL. However, there have been no official statements for this.Regarding Taylor Swift’s career, fans are expecting the release of her new album this year but again, there have been no word on this yet.Also Read: Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce get spotted in NYC but it’s his new look that’s raising eyebrows among fans
Article Summary: Taylor swift and travis kelce’s picture from an old date night resurfaces and sends fans into a frenzy. A fan account of taylor swift shared the picture on x and fans are losing their minds over it. The two decided to maintain complete privacy about their relationship and disappeared from the public eye.

Article Title: NBA Offseason Rumors: Golden State Warriors could bag $11.1 million Philadelphia 76ers guard to bolster team's defensive end; Stephen Curry's fatigue exposing crucial roster flaws?
Article Text:
Philadelphia 76ers guard Quentin Grimes (5) scores past Golden State Warriors guard Moses Moody (4) during the first quarter at Wells Fargo Center. (Image via Bill Streicher-Imagn Images).

Quentin Grimes (Image via Getty)

The Golden State Warriors, fresh off a disappointing 114-105 loss to the Denver Nuggets, are in dire need of a scoring boost. With Stephen Curry struggling and the team shooting a dismal 24.2% from three-point range, the spotlight has turned to potential summer signings. One name that stands out is Philadelphia 76ers guard Quentin Grimes, who has been on an offensive tear, averaging 34.5 points over his last five games.Grimes, a 24-year-old guard, recently dropped 46 points against the Houston Rockets, showcasing his ability to perform against elite defenses. This performance wasn’t an anomaly. Since being traded to the 76ers on Feb. 4, Quentin Grimes has been a consistent scoring threat, shooting 53.2% from the field and 42.5% from beyond the arc. His recent form has made him one of the most talked-about players in the league.The Golden State Warriors are no strangers to Grimes’ capabilities. On Mar. 1, he scored a career-high 44 points against them in a 126-119 victory. His impending status as a restricted free agent this summer makes him an attractive target for Golden State, who are looking to maximize the remaining prime years of Curry and Jimmy Butler However, acquiring Quentin Grimes won’t be straightforward. The Warriors are tight on cap space, and the future of restricted free agent Jonathan Kuminga adds another layer of complexity. If Kuminga leaves for a lucrative deal, it could free up the necessary funds to pursue Grimes. But as of now, this remains a speculative scenario.Quentin Grimes’ potential fit with the Golden State Warriors is intriguing. As a career 37.8% three-point shooter, he could complement Curry’s playstyle, providing another reliable distance threat. His ability to create his own shot and drive to the basket would add a new dimension to Golden State’s offense.Also read: NBA Offseason Rumors: Golden State Warriors could acquire $94,500,000 Brooklyn Nets forward to support Jimmy Butler and Stephen Curry; perfect to form a Warriors BIG 3? While the financial hurdles make this potential signing unlikely, the idea of Quentin Grimes joining the Warriors is tantalizing. His offensive prowess could be the spark Golden State needs to return to championship contention. As the summer approaches, all eyes will be on how the Golden State Warriors navigate their cap space and whether they can turn this fantasy into reality.
Article Summary: The golden state warriors are in dire need of a scoring boost. Quentin grimes has been on an offensive tear, averaging 34.5 points over his last five games. The warriors are tight on cap space, and the future of restricted free agent jonathan kuminga adds another layer of complexity. As of now, this remains a speculative scenario.

Article Title: NBA Summer Trade Rumors: Los Angeles Lakers could acquire $40.2 million Dallas Mavericks center during free agency; Dalton Knecht key trade asset?
Article Text:
Dallas Mavericks forward Anthony Davis (left) reacts with Los Angeles Lakers guard Dalton Knecht (right) after the game at Crypto.com Arena (Image via Gary A. Vasquez-Imagn Images)

Daniel Gafford (Image via Getty)

“Gafford doesn’t receive enough praise for his stable play on both ends,” The Los Angeles Lakers are reportedly considering a bold move to bolster their frontcourt by trading star rookie Dalton Knecht for Dallas Mavericks ’ center Daniel Gafford. This potential trade, as suggested by Bleacher Report’s Eric Pincus , could address the Lakers’ ongoing struggles in the low post.Despite commendable efforts from Alex Len and Jaxson Hayes, the Los Angeles Lakers’ frontcourt has shown noticeable limitations this season. Gafford, an underrated but impactful player, could provide the stability and energy the team desperately needs. The 26-year-old big man has been a consistent performer for the Mavericks, averaging 12.3 points, 6.9 rebounds, and 1.9 blocks per game this season while shooting an impressive 69.9% from the field.However, Daniel Gafford’s recent knee injury, which may sideline him for the remainder of the 2024-25 campaign, adds a layer of uncertainty to the trade. His contributions to the Mavericks' march to the NBA Finals the previous season cannot be understated, albeit this setback. Gafford shot 63.4% from the floor and averaged 9.0 points, 5.2 rebounds, and 1.5 blocks per game in 22 postseason games. Dallas' success was largely attributed to his rim-running prowess, defensive presence, and contagious intensity.Pincus noted. While he may not be the most skilled center in the league, his reliability and hustle make him a valuable asset for any team.For the Los Angeles Lakers, trading Knecht, a promising rookie, for Daniel Gafford represents a calculated risk. Knecht has shown flashes of potential, but the Lakers seem willing to part with him to address their immediate needs. Daniel Gafford’s $40 million contract, while significant, could be a worthwhile investment if he returns to full health and replicates his previous form.This potential trade could reshape both teams’ rosters. The Mavericks would gain a young talent in Knecht, while the Los Angeles Lakers would acquire a proven big man to strengthen their frontcourt. As the offseason approaches, all eyes will be on whether this deal comes to fruition.Also read: NBA Offseason Rumors: Los Angeles Lakers could sign $11,128,042 Sixers shooting guard to support Luka Doncic and LeBron James Let us know in the comments if you feel getting Daniel Gafford during his free agency would be a smart move from the Los Angeles Lakers front office. Would Luka Doncic, LeBron Jamesm, and the rest of the boys in yellow benefit from this potential acquisition?
Article Summary: The los angeles lakers are reportedly considering a bold move to bolster their frontcourt by trading star rookie dalton knecht for dallas mavericks’ center daniel gafford. The 26-year-old big man has been a consistent performer for the mavericks, averaging 12.3 points, 6.9 rebounds, and 1.9 blocks per game this season.

Article Title: IPL 2025: KL Rahul puts team first yet again, will bat in the middle-order for DC to ensure balance
Article Text: KL Rahul continues to exhibit flexibility in his batting roles, transitioning between top-order, middle-order, and finisher positions across formats. His adaptability will be tested once more as he likely bats in the middle-order for Delhi Capitals in the upcoming Indian Premier League season. While he last played a T20I back in the 2022 T20 World Cup, movement in the batting order could well continue when he turns up for Delhi Capitals - his fifth Indian Premier League franchise.
Article Summary: Kl rahul is likely to bat in the middle-order for delhi capitals. The batsman has played for five indian premier league franchises. Rahul last played a t20i back in the 2022 t20 world cup. He has scored more than 3,000 runs in t20 internationals.

Article Title: Freddie Freeman’s rib injury leaves LA Dodgers in a muddle for Tokyo Series
Article Text:
(Image Source: Freeman/Instagram)

Freddie Freeman says last year he was slowed by an ankle injury

Freddie Freeman talks injury, says "75% chance of playing tomorrow"

Dodgers’ Shohei Ohtani plays a key role in victory for the Tokyo Series’ first game

The Los Angeles Dodgers have kickstarted the baseball season in Japan, with two key players missing from action. The Dodgers’ first baseman Freddie Freeman and Mookie Betts have claimed injuries, due to which, they will be missing out on the action packed baseball season in Japan.The Los Angeles Dodgers’ Freddie Freeman, who was 2020 NL Most Valuable Player, said he was scratched just before the first pitch against the Chicago Cubs due to what the team said was left rib discomfort. He said he was slowed by an ankle injury during last year's World Series, though he still won MVP honors.After the World Series, Freddie Freeman said he underwent surgery on the ankle, however, and was still struggling with movement. Freeman was able to play in four consecutive Cactus League games before the Los Angeles Dodgers left for Japan.Not only Freddie Freeman, the Los Angeles Dodgers are also missing 2018 AL MVP Mookie Betts. Betts will not play in either Japan Series game against the Cubs citing his illness.The Los Angeles Dodgers have revamped their lineup on Tuesday, with Kike Hernandez moved from left field to replace Freddie Freeman at first base in the Dodgers lineup against Cubs starter Shota Imanaga. Michael Conforto, who wasn't in the original lineup, has now taken Hernandez's place in left.In the first game of the MLB Tokyo Series , the Los Angeles Dodgers began their defense for the World Series championship with a 4-1 win against the Chicago Cubs. Shohei Ohtani played a key role in the victory.In the fifth inning, Shohei Ohtani managed to get his first hit of the 2025 season. A single to right field, which helped start a three-run rally. He also scored a run, giving the Los Angeles Dodgers a push they would not lose.In the ninth inning, Ohtani led off with a double, and then he scored again when Teoscar Hernandez hit a single. He managed to finish the game with two hits in five at-bats.Also Read: Dodgers' Manager Dave Roberts Reveals Shohei Ohtani's Mentality For Tokyo Series
Article Summary: Freddie freeman and mookie betts have claimed injuries, due to which, they will be missing out on the action packed baseball season in japan. Freeman said he was slowed by an ankle injury during last year's world series. Betts will not play in either japan series game against the cubs citing his illness.

Article Title: Former WWE Star Matt Hardy Predicts the Fate of John Cena’s Last WWE Run
Article Text: John Cena’s heel turn and alliance with The Rock after winning the Elimination Chamber have stirred the WWE Universe. Cena's new persona was showcased on WWE Raw, and Matt Hardy predicts this dark turn will lead to a dramatic showdown against Cody Rhodes at WrestleMania 41.
Article Summary: John cena’s heel turn and alliance with the rock have stirred the wwe universe. Matt hardy predicts this dark turn will lead to a dramatic showdown against cody rhodes at wrestlemania 41. Cena's new persona was showcased on wwe raw.

Article Title: Pakistani-origin cricketer Junaid Zafar Khan dies on the field in 41.7 degree heat while observing fast
Article Text:
General view of the Gaddafi Stadium in Lahore, Pakistan. (AP)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

A tragic incident occurred during a cricket match in Adelaide when Pakistani-origin Australian cricketer Junaid Zafar Khan collapsed and died on the field amid extreme heat conditions.The incident took place at Concordia College Oval on Saturday around 4pm ACDT during a match between Old Concordians and Prince Alfred Old Collegians. Despite immediate medical attention from paramedics, Khan could not be revived.The weather conditions were severe with temperatures exceeding 40°C at the time of the incident. According to Adelaide Turf Cricket Association bylaws, matches must be cancelled at 42°C, though modified playing conditions are permitted for temperatures up to 40°C.As per local media, though Junaid was fasting during Ramadan, he had been consuming water all day, as exemptions permit Muslims to do so when not feeling well.The Old Concordians Cricket Club issued a formal statement regarding the tragedy: "We are deeply saddened by the passing of a valued member of the Old Concordians' Cricket Club, who tragically suffered a medical episode while playing on the Concordia College oval today. Despite the best efforts of paramedics, he sadly did not survive. Thoughts and heartfelt condolences are with his family, friends, and teammates during this difficult time."Khan, who was in his 40s, had moved to Adelaide from Pakistan in 2013 to pursue a career in the tech industry.His friend and cricket teammate Hasan Anjum remembered him fondly: "It's a huge loss, he was destined for very big things in his life."Another close friend, Najam Hassan, described Khan as a "gem of a person."The incident occurred during a severe heatwave affecting South Australia and other regions, with temperatures approaching 40°C in Sydney and Victoria.
Article Summary: Junaid zafar khan collapsed and died during a cricket match in adelaide. The incident took place during a match between old concordians and prince alfred old collegians. The weather conditions were severe with temperatures exceeding 40°c. Despite immediate medical attention from paramedics, khan could not be revived.

Article Title: Exit of JT Miller from Vancouver Canucks: Brock Boeser, Elias Pettersson Struggling on Lead Offense
Article Text:
Image Via Getty

The Two Players Right Now Are Brock Boeser and Elias Pettersson Who Suffer from JT Miller's Absence

Filip Chytil undergoes injury that weighs down Vancouver Canucks further damage

Since the separation with star forward JT Miller in January, the Vancouver Canucks have been wrestling with an inconsistent offense. It has become a perennial bother for the club, with a number of contributing factors attributed to the firepower failings. Among Canucks insiders, Dan Murphy weighs in on the problem, shedding light on some of the things that Miller's absence raises and the urgent need for more players.With JT Miller's departure in favor of the New York Rangers, the Vancouver Canucks continue to be an inconsistent offensive outfit. Over the last 18 games, they have generally scored three goals or fewer. This is clearly more than a blip on the radar and shows the presence of deep underlying issues. Sure, chances are being made, but the team has failed time and again to convert these chances into goals.Brock Boeser has fallen under the spotlight. It is like without Miller, he struggles for rhythm. His production values have plummeted, and mentally, he probably hasn't been quite right since the trade deadline. There are indications from Elias Pettersson that he is getting back into form, but there is still no consistent scorer the team can rely upon in crunch time.Another alarming thing? As of now, no forward in the Canucks organization sits on pace for 60 points this season. When you compare that to the offensive performance last year, the drop-off has made even clearer what Miller's absence created: a huge void. From injuries to shooting woes and perhaps just internal challenges, scoring for Vancouver has become all but impossible.In filling that gap, forward Filip Chytil , the new acquisition, seemed to be a decent bet but might not be a good fit in the top six. He's more of a third-line center, which means the Canucks still need more high-impact forwards to bolster their offense. Meanwhile, Quinn Hughes continues to be the main engine driving offense: the issue is that leaning on him to create chances is becoming unsustainable.Vancouver's offensive depth was further weakened after Filip Chytil suffered concussion symptoms due to a hit by Chicago Blackhawks forward Jason Dickinson. Chytil has a history of concussions. He could not get up after the hit and had to be assisted off the ice. The uncertainty surrounding his recovery now leaves the Canucks without a key center at this critical juncture in the season.In the statement of head coach Rick Tocchet, Chytil feels good, but he is still under concussion protocol. There will be an assessment within the next 48 hours to determine if he will be able to feature in the six-game road trip that the squad has to endure. At this point, Chytil's absence just adds to the challenge for Vancouver in overcoming offensive struggles.Also Read: "He Remembers How to Score": Auston Matthews’ Impressive Performance Stuns Leafs Fans in Win Over the Calgary Flames JT Miller's departure is now being felt by the Vancouver Canucks, as their offense continues to slam the brakes before limping out of the playoffs. There appears to be no clear solution to the problem, and the team has to scour up a boost for the forwards. Filip Chytil's injury will further line the tally up in terms of concerns. Thus, a priority in the offseason becomes even more compelling for management to score reinforcements.
Article Summary: Vancouver canucks continue to struggle with inconsistent offense since jt miller's departure. No forward in the canucks organization sits on pace for 60 points this season. Filip chytil's injury will further line the tally up in terms of concerns.

Article Title: Alexander Ovechkin: Leading Washington Capitals against Detroit Red Wings in the Playoff Showdown
Article Text:
Image Via Getty

The Washington Capitals Seek to Keep Extending Their Control while Alexander Ovechkin Chases the Record

Capitals' Alex Ovechkin Tips Home Number 887, Sits Eight Goals Back Of NHL Record

On March 19, 2025, at Capital One Arena, the Washington Capitals will find themselves embroiled in a heavyweight title fight against the Detroit Red Wings . Such an event occurs at this juncture between both teams but with totally different motivations. Washington thrives atop the Eastern Conference with sole play-off ambitions, while Detroit must put up with the desperation of playoff contention. The drama is made more interesting by the fact that Ovechkin is fast closing in on Wayne Gretzky's all-time record of scoring goals.At the top of the Eastern Conference where the Washington Capitals are, they have currently totaled 96 points from 67 games in superb form this season. Their last seven matches have seen them reiterating why they are seen as a powerhouse, winning six of them. A comprehensive 5-1 hammering from the San Jose Sharks only made it sure, and the crowning moment of this night for Ovechkin was his goal and an assist, bringing his all-time career tally to 887 goals, just seven behind Wayne Gretzky's legendary record of 894.Ovechkin's pursuit of history has been one of the main plots in the story of this season. Every time he scores, he approaches one of the ground-breaking milestones in National Hockey League history. On top of that, it just makes this Washington team even stronger against any opponent on account of their well-known firepower on the offensive end. In that respect, this setback wasn't that bad. The Capitals lost to the Los Angeles Kings, 0-3, but bounced right back against San Jose.Meanwhile, the Red Wings are desperately trying to keep slim hopes of playoff contention alive. Right now, the Wings sit 11th in the Eastern Conference with 70 points through 67 games too erratic performance has hurt their progress. Their ability to compete with the best was further exhibited by their ability to shut out the Vegas Golden Knights 3-0. That game was huge for goaltender Petr Mrazek, but big questions still remain regarding that team's overall defense.History makes it worse for Detroit within this matchup since they won seven of the last ten of these meetings, including one more recently by 5-2. Supreme Washington claimed too much from the Red Wings, had a home court, and so were the huge favorites in the meetings. The betting odds also favor Washington, suggesting it would be a high-scoring affair, possibly going over 6.5 goals.Also Read: Alex Ovechkin Ties Jaromir Jagr for Most Game-Winning Goals in NHL History This match between the Washington Capitals and the Detroit Red Wings tells much about the future of Ovechkin in the text. After all, with less than a week before the last Olympic roster announcement, it comes at a time when Washington is trying to tighten its hold on the Eastern Conference. While the Red Wings take this game in the hopes of achieving playoff contention, this is because both teams will put something on the line drama could run high in this contest.
Article Summary: The washington capitals face the detroit red wings on march 19, 2025. The game will be played at capital one arena in washington, d.c. The capitals are currently top of the eastern conference with 96 points from 67 games. The red wings are 11th with 70 points through 67 games and are desperate for a playoff spot.

Article Title: Stuart Skinner awarded superstar recognition in Edmonton despite fan outrage
Article Text:
Credit: Getty Images

Oilers goalie gets surprise tribute amidst criticism



Pizza 73 pays tribute to Stuart Skinner



Connor McDavid's speedy fast-food tribute is the trendsetter



Canadian professional ice hockey goaltender Stuart Skinner has been in the spotlight, although not for the reasons a goalie might wish. Though he guided the Edmonton Oilers to victories over the Montreal Canadiens and Dallas Stars, Skinner came under scrutiny following the team's shocking loss to the Buffalo Sabres—a team that had not recorded a victory since February.Oilers fans took to social media to express their frustration, with one particularly scathing post reading, “The Sabres were on a 6-game losing streak... then they played Stuart Skinner’s Oilers.”Despite the backlash, Skinner remains unfazed and is receiving a level of recognition that puts him alongside none other than Connor McDavid .Although some people doubt his recent play, Stuart Skinner is winning citywide admiration in a manner few anticipated. In an unusual show of respect, Pizza 73 is briefly changing its name to ‘Pizza 74’ to pay homage to the hometown goaltender's jersey number.Not content to end at the name change, the company is also introducing a limited-time offer in the form of the ‘ Skinner Dinner ,’ a big two-topping pizza, and three beverages for $18.99. The campaign will be very visible, as the new Pizza 74 branding will be found at Oilers games, and an official website launch will soon follow.‘Same number. New outfit. Excited to be partnering with Pizza 74’, Stuart Skinner shared on his Instagram handle.Stuart Skinner isn’t the first Oilers player to receive such an honour. Back in February, Connor McDavid saw his name take over McDonald’s locations following a clutch overtime goal that secured Canada’s 4 Nations Face-Off victory against the United States.McDonald's had turned two of its restaurants—one in Edmonton and one in Newmarket—into ‘McDavid's’ for an entire week, honouring a commitment they'd made years earlier that depended on the Oilers defeating the Florida Panthers in the Stanley Cup championship.That title never materialized, but McDavid still earned his due adoration. Stuart Skinner's next moment of unveiling is up next, proof positive that in all the criticism he took, his legacy for Edmonton is still etched in stone.
Article Summary: Stuart skinner has been in the spotlight, although not for the reasons a goalie might wish. Pizza 73 is briefly changing its name to ‘pizza 74’ to pay homage to the hometown goaltender's jersey number. The company is also introducing a limited-time offer in the form of the ‘ skinner dinner ’
